backend/main.mo: Defines product, cart, order, and user profile types plus access-controlled functions for managing products, profiles, carts, and orders.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and tests for SEO, metadata, and help page additions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise descriptions of multiple frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, dynamic canonical/OG URL script, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing homepage and products routes with changefreq and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global layout including new Help page route.
Protects admin-only sections by checking admin status and showing an access denied card if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks access to protected pages until the user signs in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that handles authentication and resets cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting newly authenticated users to set their profile name and saves it.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Displays the Buyflow logo image and text.
frontend/src/components/branding/HomeHer: Homepage hero section with background image, tagline, and link to the products page.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartIndicat: Cart icon button showing total item count and linking to the cart page.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Fetches and displays product categories as clickable cards with emojis.
frontend/src/components/forms/ShippingAd: Form for entering shipping details that builds and emits a combined address string and country value.
frontend/src/components/Header/StoreHead: Responsive header with logo, search bar, cart indicator, orders link, and login button.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, main content, footer, and link to Help page.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderCard: Displays an order summary with date, total, item count, and link to detailed view.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product display card showing image, price, stock status, rating, and linking to the product page.
Responsive product grid layout with loading skeletons and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBar: Search input that navigates to the products page with a query parameter.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminProdu: React Query mutations for adding, updating, and adjusting stock of products with cache invalidation and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCart.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cart data via the backend actor, including add, update, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Implements hooks to list, fetch, and place orders, invalidating related queries and handling errors with toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Defines product query hooks for listing, searching, and fetching products and categories using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUser.ts: Exposes hooks to get and update the caller's user profile, role, and admin status through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, auto-initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for handling Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables defining light and dark mode color themes and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for adding, editing, and managing products with forms, tabs, and React Query mutations for product and stock updates.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI with product details, quantity updates, removal, clearing, and navigation, using cart and product hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout flow with cart summary, shipping form, payment selection, validation, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Displays help content including public URL sharing and instructions for Google Search indexing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero section, categories, and a featured products grid.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details including payment method and navigation to order info pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed order info such as items, totals, shipping address, and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all orders for the user with loading, empty, and populated states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, stock info, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: Shows products filtered by search or category with dynamic titles and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/paymentMethod.ts: Maps backend PaymentMethod enum values to human-readable labels, currently supporting COD.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Provides utilities to get the public origin URL and copy text to the clipboard with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
